description: A quick win: understand MHC: The Identity Badge.

hook.text: Every cell in your body carries a molecular ID badge. If it's missing or wrong, immune cells attack.

twist.text: Organ transplant rejection happens because the donor's MHC molecules look foreign to the recipient.

punchline.text: Your cells prove their identity or get destroyed.
